game.name: RAVENRIDGE
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: You are being watched. Tested. In RAVENRIDGE, uncover the truth behind a forgotten prison as detective Ethan Ward. What begins as an investigation soon leads deep into your own mind. Are you in control, or just another subject?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You are being watched. Tested. In RAVENRIDGE, uncover the truth behind a forgotten prison as detective Ethan Ward. What begins as an investigation soon leads deep into your own mind. Are you in control, or just another subject?
